article_title: Fort Bragg Tax Center ready for tax season to begin Friday
article_text:
Susan Reynolds is the wife of an Air Force airman stationed at Fort Bragg and an advocate for military families, particularly on the issue of pediatric health care.

Read the blog

article_metadata.author: By Drew Brooks Military editor

og.description: The office on the sixth floor of Fort Bragg's Soldier Support Center was quiet Wednesday morning.
